definitions.definition: ( photochemistry , dated ) One mole of photons , regardless of frequency , as used to measure irradiance .
examples: The einstein (symbol E) is an obsolete unit with two conflicting definitions.

definitions.definition: ( informal ) A genius ; a very smart person.
examples: He's a prodigy — they call him their little einstein .

subdefinitions.definition: ( by extension , informal , sarcastic ) An idiot ; a very stupid person.
examples: Yeah, that guy is a real einstein — he always finds a way to mess up the simplest order.

main_definition: ( photochemistry , dated ) One mole of photons , regardless of frequency , as used to measure irradiance .
secondary_definitions: ( informal ) A genius ; a very smart person.

definitions.definition: A shape that can be repeated to cover a plane with a nonrepeating pattern .

main_definition: ( mathematics , physics ) A shape that can be repeated to cover a plane with a nonrepeating pattern .
